name: V_EHI_BEN_FILTER_PAT_ENC
description: Contains the encounter associated with a benefits (BEN) record. This is used for filtering in EHI exports.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the benefit record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).
